const filmsReducer = (state = initialState, action) => {
    switch (action.type) {
        case UPDATE_NEW_MESSAGE_TEXT: {
            return {
                ...state,
                newValueText: {

            }
        }
        default:

    }
}

export const updateTextActionCreator = (text) => ({type: UPDATE_NEW_MESSAGE_TEXT, newText: text});

export default filmsReducer;
